q1: What do you think about Spain's world cup performance?
q2: Spain struggled in the group stage and just won 1 out of 3 matches but were still able to win the group.
q3: Spain were poor in the group stage and were lucky to win the group.
a3: Spain had a terrible cup. They are in dire need of a striker.
q4: You think firing coach affected them?
a4: of course it affects the technician and his workouts
q5: if they were affected by the technician's exit
a5: They haven't had the same performance since firing the coach.
